name: Too Heavy to Handle ?!
description:
Too heavy to handle ?! It is a game that is based on waste recycling: plastic, glass, metal and paper. The main character is a shopping cart that has to collect garbage from the floor and recycle it in the appropriate containers.  You have limited time, but you can get more if you deposit some waste.

The difficulty: the more objects in the basket you have, the harder it is to handle (slower speed and lower jump). 

Tips: each object has a different weight. How many objects can you recycle?

Controls:

Use A and D to move left and right

Use Space to jump
